<h3 id="X31424">X(31424) = CENTROID OF CURVATURES OF THESE CIRCLES: {BEVAN, CIRCUMCIRCLE, SPIEKER}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a*(3*a^3+(b+c)*a^2-(3*b^2+2*b*c+3*c^2)*a-(b+c)^3)  :  :

<p>
X(31424) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (5290, 10198), (5715, 6824)<br>
X(31424) = X(18925)-of-2nd circumperp triangle<br>
X(31424) = {X(i), X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1, 16570, 1046), (968, 1468, 1), (3901, 5426, 1)<br>
